website_summaries.verdict: A popular brand with fast and effective weed-killing action. A good choice for preventing new weeds but not for eliminating existing ones.
pros: Good for hard-to-reach weeds and grass in cracks and crevices
Can be used safely around flowers, shrubs, and other vegetation
cons: Doesn't last as long as concentrated formulas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, but be sure to completely de-weed first as ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but after properly weeding the garden, I sprinkled Preen. Sure enough, no weeds anywhere several weeks later! I left one area untreated as a comparison, and that spot is covered now with unwanted guests. Highly recommended, but be sure to completely de-weed first as directed on the package.
customer_reviews.author: DoughBoy & EggGirl

customer_reviews.title: :::Great for Decorative Mulched Areas::::
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Here is how to keep decorative mulch 95% weed free: Pull any large weeds remaining from last year. Rake thoroughly. Add thin layer of new mulch. Apply Preen per directions - and a smidge more Reapply at 10 weeks .
customer_reviews.author: Nessmuk's Nephew

customer_reviews.title: A LIFESAVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product !!! Our large flower bed was overwhelmed with weeds due to large amounts of unexpected rain. After pulling all the weeds we scattered this throughout, walked over it to embed it into dirt. Then we watered it well. Whola!!! 3 months later and hardly a weed pops through our mulch! It has saved my back! Definitely recommend!! Arrived early!! ( Pics:1-2 After Preen, #3 is Before. Don't b fooled the large amounts of green are weeds)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best seed germination preventer out there
customer_reviews.text: Serious gardeners need this size to save money. I have used Preen in my landscaping for 20 years+ . Great product!
customer_reviews.author: BJG

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended Preen as a pre-emergent for my landscape beds, so I purchased it. I thought the package was advertised to allow me to shake out the granules, but the packaging did not allow for it (poor design). Also, it did not give directions on the amount to use, so I guessed and learned later that I spread too much. I spread the granules directly on the soil (the package stated I could spread over mulch), and they did not dissipate into the soil after I sprayed it and after two heavy rains. Finally, weeds appeared after four days even though I laid landscape fabric over the soil. (sigh)
customer_reviews.author: WPFL

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Had not used this in many years, but now my days of weeding by hand are pretty much over. Did the initial weeding in spring before they took hold, put mulch down and put this around my plants. Did it again about a month later and have pretty much no weeds now that it is August, just a few here and there. Has saved a lot of work this summer.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to harm plants
customer_reviews.text: I previously had used preen for years and had been satisfied with the product efficacy and safety. This year I have significantly more weeds and many dead or dying plants. While I cannot say for certain that Preen damaged/killed the plants, it is the only common denominator across multiple beds and plant species. I have not seen the weeds that are doing so well this year in any significant numbers in previous years. I am wondering if something changed in the product formulation or if there was some packaging or manufacturing issue. I see no up side to buying preen again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Rural User

customer_reviews.title: Does it really work?
customer_reviews.text: I had created a small garden at my backyard "Compare and Save*" herbicide(wanted to get rid of the grass where I was suppose to grow plants). "Compare and Save*" Herbicide did it's job. I was able to put my vegetables and flower plants. But I started seeing the growth of weeds. As suggested by this product - first I removed the weed, applied mulch and then this product. Well, I am not seeing much improvement. The weeds are growing under the mulch. I live in Irving TX where the peak temperature reaches around 100 during after noon. Will post an update if this works.
customer_reviews.author: Ashu Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: love this product, it works amazing! I find that i reapply more often than recommended for better results. I even us this in my alley to keep the weed population way down after initial roundup. I use this in all of my flower beds, in my garden once seedlings have germinated and are well established. I apply to dry soil and then water to keep it from blowing away. I recommend this to EVERYONE =)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pre-weeder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. You can't apply it to existing weeds and you can't apply it if you've weeded but not removed the roots. If you've weeded properly or apply this in early spring before anything starts waking up, it does the job. Lasts for about 3 months. Otherwise, use it throughout the season but know you won't eliminate all weeds.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using Preen for over 20 yrs. living in Florida weeds grow all year. I put this down every 4 to 5 months. Weeds dont come back. The secret is pulling up your weeds sprinkle down your preen and water it in is the secret. Watering it will activate it and NO MORE WEEDS. This product has been a life saver for my aging back. I even use it around my fence line to keep weeds away. A must have for every garden, best part you can put it around your shrubs and trees and flowers and it doesnt harm them.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Cleared out a small plot of about 3' x 5' ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleared out a small plot of about 3' x 5' and filled it with some new soil. Watched the area and pulled out the few weeds that appeared over a month or so. Added this as spring approached. Weeds everywhere in the last few weeks. Helps grow weeds!
customer_reviews.author: sangdedieu

customer_reviews.title: not for veg garden
customer_reviews.text: when ordered it said garden weed preventer however when i went to use the item the instructions and package says NOT FOR VEG GARDENS. its too late now to return the item and its useless for any purpose i would have. wasted my money. not even the same package shown on sight
customer_reviews.author: Kena

customer_reviews.title: No weeds!
customer_reviews.text: Discovering Preen was a major life changer - yes - it was - I used to spend hours weeding the huge amount of flower beds where the lawn people never get involved - I did try a service to spray and it was useless - then I discovered Preen - I know I sound like I work for the company - nope just trying to pass the good word on - I was buying it in small containers but I use it every 3-4 months in order to stay ahead of the weeds and I like finding this larger size - No weeds!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Artist

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy this in a plastic container from the hardware store. This one cost less per application and also makes less plastic to recycle. It says its good for 3 months but I use it every 2 months when there is lots of rain. Works really good but not on all the weed seeds. Still worth the cost to cut the effort of pulling new weeds.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: I used this for the first time this season. ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time this season. When it says not to get it on leaves of plants they aren't kidding. Be VERY careful if it is the slight bit breezy. Several of my plants now have holes in the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy H

customer_reviews.title: Meh, doesn't stand a chance in the PNW
customer_reviews.text: Used the entire bag over mulched yard as directed and it has made absolutely no difference. Still seeing weeds pop all over the place. This was my last hope. Alas, there is no solution to the pacific northwest weed other than some old fashioned hard labor. Guess I'll be pulling out weeds by hand.
customer_reviews.author: DigiSym

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. It cuts down the number of weeds that ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It cuts down the number of weeds that pop up in our landscaped beds by about 90% and saves me so much time. I couldn't keep up with all the weeding in our large yard before, but now I'm able to keep them weed-free with much less work. Preen has been a real lifesaver since I started using it two years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works well as advertised,
customer_reviews.text: This weed preventer seems to work as advertised. I have only put it down once and it instructs to use it every three. It has stopped the weeds, however not the ones that already were already growing. However, The directions on the package did make me aware of that and I am satisfied. Pulled the other weeds and the areas look very good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buys

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Big Difference
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for pre-emergent weed prevention in February for several years. There is enough in the bag to do a good size lot and to put a second layer on the high weed areas in a couple of weeks. This product works. It is hard to find; so, Amazon is a good source.
customer_reviews.author: James N. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Preen
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I've used it for years. In Colorado I've put it on as early as February right before a good soaking snow. For sure put it on in March. If you do it right before a rain or snow you don't have to water it in. It works well in river rock bordered areas as well. I highly recommend it and buy it in as large a container as you can.
customer_reviews.author: jkooi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Product cane just in time as rain fell the next day after receiving and applying. Using battery operated spreader, I covered area of approx 1/3 acre using about 3/4 of the bag-hopefully effective so I have no weed formation in my backyard where I recently installed 20 solar panels on ground mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Living in FLA is a daily battle with weeds in flower beds. I just redid them and spread Preen. I am thrilled to say that the weeds are not returning as profusely as they had been. Will continue to use this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Lily

customer_reviews.title: Preen does kill living plants
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkled Preen on my garden paths which were covered with creeping Speedwell. The Speedwell, which I love, died and I still have unwanted seedlings appearing on the now bare paths. Preen is not supposed to do this! I am extremely sad about this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: While it does a good job I would recommend not putting the granules up close to the stalk. It seemed to stunt the growth of the plant for some time but eventually the plants seemed to do better and ended up producing a good crop.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Weeds Preventer.... and it does a good job
customer_reviews.text: great stuff... works very well... but u do need to re-apply about every 3 months... and don't forget... IF the weed seed has already germinated... IT WILL STILL POP UP.. u have to catch the seed BEFORE it germinated...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much time!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved us so much time from weeding. Works great to keep the weeds down, we reapply about every 3-4 months in the spring-fall and have only a handful of weeds to pull during that entire time. We love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instead of killing the bad weed, it made it grow out of control. My back yard looks like a jungle.
customer_reviews.author: JDUSA

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: If used according to instruction, will reduce (not eliminate) weeds. Do not use on bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Thannisan

customer_reviews.title: Great for our yard and roses
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our yard and also for our rose bushes (we have about 200 different ones) it works a little slower than some of the 24 hour ones, but it is less damaging than Roundup and it works for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Weed Preventer
customer_reviews.text: This weed preventer really does work. Make sure you apply it right. I haven't had a problem. One or two weed seeds might pop up but other than that it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and arrived on time! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that works very well without being quite as harsh as other weed killers out there. It doesnt actually kill the weeds,it prevents the regrowth. It is easy to use if you don't mind clearing the weeds yourself. Just be sure to keep yourself, clothing, and shoes protected as this product has stained my shoes yellow in the past. Otherwise,it's excellent and I will purchase again off amazon to get a very discounted price compared to in store purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Julie

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver to cut down on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver to cut down on the weeds in my flower beds. I was constantly pulling weeds until I put out this Preen Weed Preventer. It made a world of difference! There may be a weed here or there that pops up, but that is all. I will never be without this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Yo definitely have to get the weeds OUT first, but once that is done, it works like it says. I have had to occasionally go and removes various crabgrass, etc manually, but I think those are some I missed. I imagine nothing is 100% but this stuff is a life saver for our garden and flower beds. Will definitely order again, and may try the one with fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: TDraper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Preen is a great product. I put it in my landscaping every 3-4 months and I don't get any weeds. It makes it so much easier to care for my landscaping because I'm not constantly pulling weeds. I am looking forward to trying the extended formula (every 6 months) at my next application.
customer_reviews.author: Sonrisa

customer_reviews.title: Preen The Preventer.
customer_reviews.text: This weed preventer was recommended by a girlfriend from Chicago. Who has a beautiful yard. I couldn't find it here in Florida. So I looked and found it on Amazon. It works. Does what it says it will. Never heard of it before. But now I see commercials on it. Must be gaining in the popular arena.
customer_reviews.author: Menia

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISPLEASED WITH THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We prepared the areas to be treated with this product following the directions assiduously. We were completely floored when a month later, brand new weeds were sprouting throughout the areas treated. We will be returning the bags for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: afortiori

customer_reviews.title: Came recommended as weed preventive care
customer_reviews.text: I put this down a month ago on 3 flower beds and so far the green onions are the only pest I can't seem to get rid off. It comes with a scoop and is easily spread. Recommended usage: twice a year so I will see if this really works in another month or so.
customer_reviews.author: NicoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't kill weeds, but does help prevent new weeds from popping up. We religiously put this stuff down, before new mulch, and it does the trick. Makes a major difference in the amount of new weeds propagating in our mulch beds.
customer_reviews.author: KarlWS

customer_reviews.title: Kills the weeds. Greener grass
customer_reviews.text: Grass is greener and the clover and weeds are gone. One application cleaned up the front lawn. Used a drop spreader and followed the instructions on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Deljr

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This item blows. It does nothing to weed. It's almost a fertilizer to help weeds grow. It was a waste of money. I put this on the weeds and so far it has done nothing. They look greener than ever. I just bought another brand. We will see how that goes. I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wonder about this product if the strength declines with age. I have used it previously and sometime it seems to work better that other times.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Randall

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy on Preen Weed Preventer
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large garden, this 31 lb bag is a much cheaper way to go than buying the shaker jugs at a garden center. I use it to refill a jug spreader but a push type fertilizer spreader can be set to work just fine. Preen saves a lot of aggravation by keeping weeds from popping up in your flower garden or liriope bed. Works for 3 to 4 months after application.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Skorzeny

customer_reviews.title: Found lower price
customer_reviews.text: Good product but found a better price and bigger container two days later at BJs :(
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: fragile packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have used preen for years and it works well but usually has to be reapplied every month. The bag cracks easily and arrived in too large a box so it slid around and broke open. It was all there just much of it in the box. I moved it into a bucket . Be careful opening.
customer_reviews.author: karen tenn

customer_reviews.title: A little does not go along way.
customer_reviews.text: First time user. I could not believe the difference this stuff made! I’ve hardly had any weeds in my flower beds since putting Preen in. The only thing to really note is that I had to use a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and there is a hole in the bag therefore some Preen has spilled in the box. Hole is on the bottom of the bag so I had to tape it up. Just a pain and extra work
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: One spreads these before the rain or will need to water the granules in the soil. Lasts about six months. Works well. If you water the granule, you don’t have to worry about birds eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Myo Aung

customer_reviews.title: Timing is very important
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Timing is very important! You must do this early, before or very early when you see the 1st weeds sprouting. I do it very early spring and again late summer. This is a huge bag and goes a long way. Much better price than local.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferDraut

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: preen works great on weed prevention however you must remove any existing weeds then Preen will take over
customer_reviews.author: adoptapop

customer_reviews.title: I think this product did some good, but I still pull a lot of weeds
customer_reviews.text: I have half an acre of gardens, mostly ground cover, in Hawaii, surrounding my house. Lots of weeds! I think this product did some good, but I still pull a lot of weeds. I'm not buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: This Preen is great! It prevents weed seeds from germinating and the effect lasts for many weeks! Wish I had discovered this years ago! Wish I could use it in my organic veggie garden.
customer_reviews.author: gardener in NC

customer_reviews.title: This does work
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help keep the weeds in my flower gardens away. This product does work. I do suggest that you follow the directions on the bottle to get the benefit from it. I used it in a couple different gardens I have. One garden had wood chips down already so I just put the preen on top of that, it didn't work as well as the garden where I put it on the black dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Spalife

customer_reviews.title: Preen is the best item ever
customer_reviews.text: Preen (when used ahead of time) stops weeds. Delivery lady was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Carks

customer_reviews.title: Weed Control at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Have used the Preen product for several years to control the NEW growth of weeds in my flower and mulch beds, and rock gardens. This product does exactly as advertised. Please remember it does not eliminate existing weeds, but it does a great job of controlling the growth of NEW weeds. As always, I bought this product from Amazon because the price was the BEST I found in any store or anywhere online. Delivery was prompt and it arrived without any damage to the packing.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Burns Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working the grass is not sprouting again after application.
customer_reviews.author: Crow T Robot

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: Preen falls short of magic but does a substantial job. Where there used to be many weeds, only a few pop up. Any weeds now are quite manageable. When one pops up, I push the mulch back slightly and pull or break off the stem as close to the ground as possible. Then I put a pinch of Preen there to deter future growth. So good so far . . . (and yes, I meant to say it that way).
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Bamonti

customer_reviews.title: Preen weed out
customer_reviews.text: 2 months later after pulling all the weeds and then adding Preen down the weeds came back.
customer_reviews.author: DebiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Big bag.
customer_reviews.text: I spread it in February here in Tennessee. I still have some weeds but not as many as I could have without it.
customer_reviews.author: Thoop

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, good price, and on time. It doesn't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Got triple the weeds with this
customer_reviews.text: this Year I tried this product and got triple or more weeds then last year. Maybe the weeds in Ohio love this stuff. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: stan marshall

customer_reviews.title: Effective product
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to spread as the one with the shaker top. Had to put in a bucket to spread
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Slater

customer_reviews.title: packaging pits!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product not packaged properly so bag was compromised and some of product thus came out of bag. There is no place for packaging review and only resolution is to return 31 lbs of product and the box was damaged ..... something missing here...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! I have so less to weed using Preen. It really works great if you remove the weeds first. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gramy

customer_reviews.title: That it kills the weeds
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but I don't know what happened, but the weeds got thicker and grew real fast after putting this on it was probably something else but it didn't kill the weeds at all.
customer_reviews.author: bucksnort

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Preen really does prevent the weeds. Saves me a lot of time because I do not have to pull weeds. I've used this for years and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a back yard that can get full of weeds that need wracking down every year so this year I thought I would get a head start and put down Preen to prevent weeds from growing in first place I also put in flower bed in front yard to prevent weeds growing and instead of flowers will lay on top of Preen colored aquarium stones instead of mulch
customer_reviews.author: Karol Bentley

customer_reviews.title: PREEN!
customer_reviews.text: Oh Preen where have you been all my life?! I absolutely hate weeding and I cannot believe how well this stuff works. It's been quite rainy here since I applied it and I would normally have a zillion weeds at this time. There are weeds here and there but for at least 90% less than I owuld normally expect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have use this is my flower beds for years. It does a good job of keeping weeds at a minimum. I still have to weed occasionally even though I have mulch around my plants. It definitely cuts down on maintenance which saves me time. It is easy to apply, it has a pour sprout and closes and keeps it tightly closed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Oma Q

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaper than paying someone to pull weeds.
customer_reviews.text: $20 per the PREEN, saves me hours of yard work.
customer_reviews.author: health-wise

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I applied it to my flowerbeds for the first time, I already see an improvement. Less weeds popping up, a def plus. I will continue to pull existing weeds as I see them. I will apply again in August as recommended and look forward to seeing the results. Excellent t price, cheapest I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The bougainvillea that grows around the perimeter of our property is always weed free. I spread Preen every year in early March and have never had a weed problem. I suggest you make the Preen a separate order, though, because it will be shipped in the same box as everything else in your order, including with food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine when used as directed. Weed preventer not week killer! Surface must be weed free and this will definitely prevent new weeds if used per directions.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: 95% effective
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have blocked 95% of weeds saving me a ton of time and effort
customer_reviews.author: Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: And love the price. It keeps my weeds at bay. Re apply every 2.5 to 3 months for a weed free season.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't someone tell me about this product sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I've been pulling weeds for week after week, year after year, and aside from products that deal with the grown weed (Weed B Gone, Round Up) I never knew there was a way to easily prevent them in the first place - who knew? Now that I do I can heartily recommend this product - I spread some at the end of May and now, in early August, I still have no weeds - amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DaJoos

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great, and this is a HUGE amount
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great, and this is a HUGE amount. I did my whole front garden bed that takes 4 yards of mulch and probably still have 15lbs left.
customer_reviews.author: khillah

customer_reviews.title: I like to buy the larger containers of Preen
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders to control weeds. Because we have a large yard with several large flower beds, I like to buy the larger containers of Preen. The larger sizes are difficult to find in retail stores. I was pleased to find and purchase the 16 lb pail size through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LFH

customer_reviews.title: weedfree gardening
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm --- wished I had used it much sooner ... producing our own soil by composting
customer_reviews.author: Charliesbestfriend

customer_reviews.title: ... to keep new weeds from sprouting which is a great relief.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked to keep new weeds from sprouting which is a great relief.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Have used it successfully for years
customer_reviews.text: One must evenly distribute this right after weeding, raking, planting, and then watering it in. Have used it for years. Having gotten a bit sloppy this year, I am paying for NOT using it quickly enough. Excellent product, and apparently safe near veggies.
customer_reviews.author: ZED

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at great price. Product works as described and keeps weeds out of garden for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stop weeds from sprouting
customer_reviews.text: This product did not stop any weeds from growing. I'm going back to casoran!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's Preen. It works. What else is there to know?
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: Preen
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and is good at preventing weeds
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again due to price
customer_reviews.text: Product is same but smaller amount for same price as larger amount in other venues.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for keeping the weeds in my rock lawn ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for keeping the weeds in my rock lawn to a minimum. You must use regularly before weeds get started.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the weeds back
customer_reviews.text: Covered the whole yard. Not a big yard .18 acres and half of it is flower garden.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: After cleaning out the flower bed fully of weeds and planting flower bulbs bushes trees shrubs ect. Sprinkle this on then mulch everything have not seen a weed since! I will reapply again probably every 2 months just to make sure =) Will just sprinkle it on the mulch.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Say "goodbye" to weeding
customer_reviews.text: Preen is a great product if you do not want to weed during the spring, summer, and fall months. I put a layer before I mulched and then after I mulched as well... that may be overkill but I haven't had to weed once in the two months that I planted flowers. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: hillmegh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of rocks and wood chips in my yard. I've used Preen for many years. Without it I would be spending a lot of time pulling weeds. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: killed my garden
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and my corn, squash, onions, pumpkins and beets all died after they popped up. Will not ever use this again. Didnt have any weeds but also dont have a garden. If i could give this ZERO stars i would!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It might be preventing some weeds, but certainly not all weeds.
customer_reviews.author: TCombel

customer_reviews.title: recommended by Master Gardener
customer_reviews.text: I garden for fun, so do not enjoy pulling weeds. I Preen 3 times per year. (I live in TN, where winter annuals need to be Preened.) By applying Preen before the spring & autumn annuals sprout, I am able to keep my beds clean-looking with a minimum of effort. I could not maintain the number of beds in my yard without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: no weeds no problem,  well maybe one or two, but this is a real time / labor savor
customer_reviews.text: this is she Sh$t you want to put out to help keep weeds out of your bedding and plants, a liitle bit in the cup and just shake away
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Creasing works and saves manual labor of pulling and spraying nasty weed killers ..
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: one application per year for us, keeps us from spending all year weeding...
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Cohen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I put down after thoroughly weeding garden 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I put down after thoroughly weeding garden 2 weeks ago. I have had a few stragglers to pull but overall it appears to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: I tore out all of the hedges and bushes and old flower plans from my patio surround. Of course, there were weeds galore that had gone unattended also. After cleaning up the area I spread the Preen per the instructions and it has been a month and no weeds to be seen while i ponder what I want to do with the area now.
customer_reviews.author: pnkfuchsia

customer_reviews.title: Prevents weed seeds from germination
customer_reviews.text: Good value prevents weeds if applied early in season; prevents germination
customer_reviews.author: Alice  J ohnson

product_meta.title: Preen 264107 Garden Weed Preventer - 13 lb. - Covers 2,080 sq. ft.
product_meta.description: Size:13 lb. Covers 2,080 sq. ft.Preen Garden Weed Preventer allows users to apply to prevent weed seeds from germinating. Spread on bedding areas and water in to prevent weeds for up to 3 months. Use in flower, shrub and all bedding areas. All existing weeds and grasses must be removed prior to use.
feature_bullets: Stop weeds before they start for up to 3 months guaranteed
Safe for use around over 200 established flowers, vegetables, trees and shrubs
Apply anytime in spring, summer or fall
Weed preventer does not kill existing weeds
Safe for use on edibles (see use directions for complete list)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
